archimate:Requirement.name: SA.1.8.2c: c) send an alert if an attempted (or successful) breach of sign-in security is detected (e.g. when a certain number of wrong password attempts has been reached)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
